alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:09PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Baca and southeastern Las Animas Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 209 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles northwest of Kim to 8 miles northwest of Kenton. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pritchett and Kim. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
